title: Payback
creator_contributor_role: New South Wales Film and Television Office, partner
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Revenge
abstract: Even in a white man's jail, you can't escape your payback day.
description: Paddy, an old aboriginal man, has been in jail for twenty years. It is the day of his release. Paddy knows of two laws - white law and black law. The twenty years he has spent doing time for the white man's law has been in preparation for this one - his payback day.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002682; Mother Courage: the backstory; Withdrawn; 25 Jan 2013
related_objects: Collection; B1003629; AFI Collection; Active; 14 Apr 2002
